tool_description: Meta’s new social media app Threads (like Instagram). Threads (Meta) Media Download, Profile,...
name: Threads Media Download
title: Threads Media Download

api_list.name: User Post Detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://threads-media-download.p.rapidapi.com/user/post"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "threads-media-download.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
